title: Contributor Code of Conduct
text: contributors maintainers project, pledge respect people contribute reporting issues, posting feature requests, updating documentation, submitting pull requests patches, activities. committed making participation project harassment-free experience everyone, regardless level experience, gender, gender identity expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion. Examples unacceptable behavior participants include use sexual language imagery, derogatory comments personal attacks, trolling, public private harassment, insults, unprofessional conduct. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct. Project maintainers follow Code Conduct may removed project team. Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported opening issue contacting one project maintainers. Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant (https://www.contributor-covenant.org), version 1.0.0, available https://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/0/0/.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Athanasia Mo Mowinckel. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Mowinckel (2026). ggsegCraddock: Craddock Functional Parcellations 'ggseg' Ecosystem. R package version 1.0.0, https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegCraddock.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ggsegCraddock: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem},   author = {Athanasia Mo Mowinckel},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 1.0.0},   url = {https://github.com/ggseg/ggsegCraddock}, }

what: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegCraddock
title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegCraddock
text: ggseg 2.0 atlas package providing brain atlas data ggseg ecosystem. data-package custom functions.

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegCraddock
text: data/*.rda — Unified ggseg_atlas objects (2D + 3D one object) R/data.R — Roxygen2 documentation atlas R/ggsegCraddock-package.R — Package-level docs, imports ggseg.formats data-raw/ — Scripts generated/converted atlas data

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegCraddock
text: package depends ggseg.formats provides ggseg_atlas class. atlas objects work ggseg::geom_brain() (2D) ggseg3d::ggseg3d() (3D).

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegCraddock
text: Update docs: devtools::document() Run tests: devtools::test() (testthat edition 3, describe/style) Full check: devtools::check() Build pkgdown site: pkgdown::build_site()

title: Quick instructions for AI coding agents working on ggsegCraddock
text: code comments except necessary workarounds Roxygen2 markdown enabled Tests use describe/BDD style vdiffr visual regression NEWS.md tracks user-facing changes (CI/pkgdown changes) URLs point ggseg GitHub org (LCBC-UiO)

what: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the ggseg Ecosystem
title: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: Work Progress — package active development yet officially released. Craddock spatially constrained spectral clustering parcellation ggseg ecosystem.

title: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: can install package GitHub :

title: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the ggseg Ecosystem
code: library(ggseg) #> Loading required package: ggseg.formats library(ggsegCraddock) library(ggplot2)  ggplot() +   geom_brain(     atlas = craddock200_cortical,     mapping = aes(fill = label),     position = position_brain(hemi ~ view),     show.legend = FALSE   ) +   scale_fill_manual(values = craddock200_cortical$palette, na.value = "grey") +   theme_void() +   ggtitle("Craddock 200 cortical parcellation")

title: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the ggseg Ecosystem
code: ggplot() +   geom_brain(     atlas = craddock200_subcortical,     mapping = aes(fill = label),     position = position_brain(. ~ view),     show.legend = FALSE   ) +   scale_fill_manual(values = craddock200_subcortical$palette, na.value = "grey") +   theme_void() +   ggtitle("Craddock 200 subcortical parcellation")

title: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: Craddock RC et al. (2012). whole brain fMRI atlas generated via spatially constrained spectral clustering. Human Brain Mapping, 33(8), 1914-1928.

title: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the ggseg Ecosystem
text: Please note ggsegCraddock project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

title: Craddock 200 Cortical Parcellation — craddock200_cortical
text: Cortical regions Craddock 200-parcel spatially constrained spectral clustering parcellation (Craddock et al., 2012). Contains 2D polygon geometry ggseg::geom_brain() 3D vertex indices ggseg3d::ggseg3d().

title: Craddock 200 Cortical Parcellation — craddock200_cortical
text: ggseg.formats::ggseg_atlas object (cortical).

title: Craddock 200 Cortical Parcellation — craddock200_cortical
text: Craddock RC et al. (2012). whole brain fMRI atlas generated via spatially constrained spectral clustering. doi:10.1002/hbm.21333

title: Craddock 200 Subcortical Parcellation — craddock200_subcortical
text: Subcortical regions Craddock 200-parcel spatially constrained spectral clustering parcellation (Craddock et al., 2012). Contains 2D polygon geometry 3D meshes.

title: Craddock 200 Subcortical Parcellation — craddock200_subcortical
text: ggseg.formats::ggseg_atlas object (subcortical).

title: Craddock 200 Subcortical Parcellation — craddock200_subcortical
text: Craddock RC et al. (2012). whole brain fMRI atlas generated via spatially constrained spectral clustering. doi:10.1002/hbm.21333

title: Craddock 200 Subcortical Parcellation — craddock200_subcortical
code: craddock200_subcortical() #>  #> ── craddock200_subcortical ggseg atlas ───────────────────────────────────────── #> Type: subcortical #> Regions: 14 #> Hemispheres: NA #> Views: axial_1, axial_2, coronal_1, sagittal #> Palette: ✔ #> Rendering: ✔ ggseg #> ✔ ggseg3d (meshes) #> ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> # A tibble: 14 × 3 #>    hemi  region     label      #>    <chr> <chr>      <chr>      #>  1 NA    parcel 041 Parcel_041 #>  2 NA    parcel 045 Parcel_045 #>  3 NA    parcel 047 Parcel_047 #>  4 NA    parcel 067 Parcel_067 #>  5 NA    parcel 083 Parcel_083 #>  6 NA    parcel 091 Parcel_091 #>  7 NA    parcel 103 Parcel_103 #>  8 NA    parcel 139 Parcel_139 #>  9 NA    parcel 152 Parcel_152 #> 10 NA    parcel 169 Parcel_169 #> 11 NA    parcel 178 Parcel_178 #> 12 NA    parcel 190 Parcel_190 #> 13 NA    parcel 194 Parcel_194 #> 14 NA    parcel 196 Parcel_196

what: ggsegCraddock: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegCraddock-package
title: ggsegCraddock: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegCraddock-package
text: Craddock spatially constrained spectral clustering parcellations various resolutions 'ggseg' ecosystem. Provides unified 'ggseg_atlas' object 2D polygon geometry 3D vertex indices, use 'ggseg' 'ggseg3d'.

title: ggsegCraddock: Craddock Functional Parcellations for the 'ggseg' Ecosystem — ggsegCraddock-package
text: Maintainer: Athanasia Mo Mowinckel .m.mowinckel@psykologi.uio.(ORCID)

title: ggsegCraddock 1.0.0
text: Initial release craddock200_cortical craddock200_subcortical atlases unified ggseg_atlas objects ggseg 2.0 ecosystem.
